title: 服务器权限组问题
author: Tribunny
txt_content: GM自带的Builder权限组自带的权限不能删除，求破

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
在plugins文件夹里的Groupmanager文件夹里的globalgroup里改， g:essentials_builder:

    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.afk.auto
